name: Landshark Missile Attack
description:
Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left click to aim missiles
  • Double tap a direction in the air to air-dodge

Shark things!

  • Jump to Bullet time!
  • Homing missles!
  • Stealth!
  • CARNAGE!
  • Eat people to heal!

Ludum Dare page

This is the post-compo verision, the original can be found here

This was my first Ludum Dare and it has been incredible! There's still A LOT MORE to add and improve on LANDSHARK MISSILE ATTACK, but I need to know if you think it's worthg persuing! do get in touch if you wanna see it get finished! Thanks for your time! :D

Thanks for playing!
